front.title: OSPFv2 Extensions for Link Capabilities to support U-turn Alternates for IP/LDP Fast-Reroute

abstract.t: This document proposes an extension to OSPF Version 2 for advertisinglink capabilities using the extensions defined for trafficengineering. The link capabilities are defined there for futureextensibility. To support the signaling requirements of U-turnalternates for IP Fast-Reroute, this document defines three bits inthe proposed link capabilities extension.
